string.value: I was finally able to learn the "Maker" skill through Moren. Awesome!! Does this mean I can make something right now from scratch? But... where should I start? While I was standing there not knowing what to do, that was when a man came up to me to tell me something. That man happened to be Moren's friend and a legend in the field of making Monster Crystal, Ramain.

Ramain works with Moren and happens to be known as the master of producing Monster Crystals. He's a nice fellow, but his stuttering makes him really hard to understand. Anyway, after watching me being unsure of myself what to do with the skill, he offered to teach me how to produce a Monster Crystal. He then asked me to make one right there on the spot...\n\n#i4260000# #t4260000# #b#c4260000# / 1#k

Ramain, the master of producing Monster Crystals who is Moren's coworker, taught me how to produce a Monster Crystal. It was a bit difficult to understand him due to his constant stuttering, but it was very helpful. Then, he asked me to make one right there on the spot, challenging me to make 1 #t4260000#, the easiest Monstery Crystal to make. After making one, Ramain took a look at it, and commended me for my effort. Hah! Does this mean I can be considered an Item Producer now?

어이...거기...거기...젊은이...나 좀 보...보지? 그래. 자네...말일세. 보아하니 스탠의 제...제자가 된것 같은데. 얼굴표정을 보...보아하니 뭘 어..어떻..게 해야할지 전혀 모...모르겠다는 어...얼굴이군. 그렇다면...내가 아..이템..제작에 가..가장 기본이 되는 몬..몬스터 결정 만드는 바...방법을 알려줄까? 자..자네 새...생각은 어떤가?

Hey you... the,there... can you c,come see m,me for a second...? Y,yes, you... It looks like you've be,become Moren's ap, apprentice. I'm loo, looking at you from here, a, and your fa,face say you don't know wh, what to do... if that's the ca, case... do you wa, want me to teach you h, how to make a Mon, Monster Crystal? I'll te, teach you the easiest wo, one... what do you th, think?

O, okay... first, open your M, Maker skill window, and... you'll no, notice that the ma, materials for the Mo, Monster Cr, Crystal are not listed. That's be, because... there are so ma, many materials out th, there... that can ma, make the Mo, Monster Cry, Crystal...

Mo...Monster Crystals are ma, made... using the dr, droppings from the mo, monster... and it doesn't ma, matter what kind of dr, drops you're using... ju, just ...#r100 of the same kind#k is all th, that's needed to ma, make the Mo...Monster Crystal.\E, Every once in a while, you, you'll run into... a number of items... th, that you can't use to ma, make a Monster Crystal... bu, but mo, most of them can be u, used to make one...

The qu, quality of the Mo, Monster Crystal differs... ba, based on the ma, materials you use to ma, make it... and ba, basically... #rthe hi, higher the level of the mo, monster... the hi, higher the level of Mo, Monster Crystal... you can ma, make...#k \n\nAnd... ev, every once in a while, you'll make a hi, highly-concentrated Mo, Monster Crystal... and that all de, depends on... how good you f, feel that d, day...
Okay... no, now... let's ma, make one, shall we? Ju, just follow my instruc...tions and ma, make #b1 #t4260000##k... I ha, have a feeling yo, you will do just fi, fine...
I... I see... if so, th, then... I will se, see you around...

Le, let's see... the Mo, Monster Crystal you ma, made... hmmm... a bit ro, rough here and there, bu, but... not too ba, bad for your fi, first time... you, you see how ro, round this e, edge is...? Th, this should be av, avoided at all times... bu, but... it shines quite ni, nicely...

I... I will be lo, looking forward to yo, your work from he, here on out... The #bEn...Enhancement Gem#k is a re, refined gem that was c, cut...#b so in, include this when ma, making items, and th, this will im, improve the quality of the, the item...#k Try it so, sometime... it's a gi, gift from me.
Di, didn't I ask you, you to ma, make 1 #b#t4260000##k...? I, I may be old, bu, but... I do ha, have good me, memory.
